oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Death of Spunk
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Haynes, Daniel L.; McGarrity, Everett; film; African Americans; "Hallelujah!";
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Scene from Hallelujah! Daniel Haynes, "Zeke," holds his brother, "Spunk," who has been shot.
